item.description: Trump is saying he has "a cloud of executive power that follows him wherever he goes," just like the "Peanuts" character, Asha Rangappa explained. https://t.co/8cKcGmcX2Y

item.description: @darrel_miller Also, screens are better at displaying stuff that's spread out vertically. XML is very compact vertically, but spreads out horizontally. An accident of history, an unforeseen consequence. JSON looks smaller because our world is tilted 90 degrees in its favor. ;-)
item.source:markdown: @darrel_miller Also, screens are better at displaying stuff that's spread out vertically. XML is very compact vertically, but spreads out horizontally. An accident of history, an unforeseen consequence. JSON looks smaller because our world is tilted 90 degrees in its favor. ;-)

item.description:
I don't make a big deal about file size, because compression, but some people care.

Think about it for a minute, before reading the next message in the thread.

Consider: Which is more space-efficient, XML or JSON?

XML is more space-efficient than JSON.

I know. I didn't believe it either!

An XML file and a JSON file with exactly the same data.

XML file is 16.2K.

https://t.co/ddTjt3cZHQ

JSON file is 45.1K.

https://t.co/zdJwcDTdlK

It isn't obvious to me why.
item.source:markdown:
I don't make a big deal about file size, because compression, but some people care.
Think about it for a minute, before reading the next message in the thread.
Consider: Which is more space-efficient, XML or JSON?
XML is more space-efficient than JSON.
I know. I didn't believe it either!
An XML file and a JSON file with exactly the same data.
XML file is 16.2K.
https://t.co/ddTjt3cZHQ
JSON file is 45.1K.
https://t.co/zdJwcDTdlK
It isn't obvious to me why.

item.description:
It would be great if Merrick Garland got the same media team that did the Jan 6 hearings to work on making the case of Trump's criminality to the public. That's really where the trial will take place, where the future of the country will be decided.

That said, yesterday's Garland talk, while brief, was effective.

Speak softly and carry a big stick.

https://t.co/FxjAvOOZNO

He carries the biggest stick, almost as big as that held by the Supreme Court, or POTUS or the Federal Reserve Bank, the Koch Brothers.
item.source:markdown:
It would be great if Merrick Garland got the same media team that did the Jan 6 hearings to work on making the case of Trump's criminality to the public. That's really where the trial will take place, where the future of the country will be decided.
That said, yesterday's Garland talk, while brief, was effective.
Speak softly and carry a big stick.
https://t.co/FxjAvOOZNO
He carries the biggest stick, almost as big as that held by the Supreme Court, or POTUS or the Federal Reserve Bank, the Koch Brothers.

item.description: @jeffjarvis i hate to see you struggle with the nyt. they are a lost cause. it's like that character in harry met sally. she keeps learning that her lover will never leave his wife. the nyt is incorrigible. i know you're a journalism prof, so you kind of have to accept them.
item.source:markdown: @jeffjarvis i hate to see you struggle with the nyt. they are a lost cause. it's like that character in harry met sally. she keeps learning that her lover will never leave his wife. the nyt is incorrigible. i know you're a journalism prof, so you kind of have to accept them.
